projects.title: Appointo
projects.description: Appointment Booking System for Clinics. It helps patient to book appointments in clinics to get rid of standing in line for long time. Also planning to add online doctor consulting to this project.

projects.title: DineFyne
projects.description: DineFyne is a contactless solution that digitizes and enhances customer-facing interaction in restaurants. It helps restaurants in creating digital menu as well as in managing orders. Itâ€™s basically a Digital Menu Creator and Order Management System for Restaurants.
